name: Commonwealth, Appellant, v. Bell Telephone Company of Pennsylvania

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
parties: Commonwealth, Appellant, v. Bell Telephone Company of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed. See Commonwealth v. Equitable Gas Company, 415 Pa. 113, 202 A. 2d 11 (1964).
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Edward T. Baker, Deputy Attorney General, with him J. Shane Creamer, Attorney General, for Commonwealth, appellant.
Albert J. Tomalis, Jr., with him Leon D. Metzger, and Metzger, Hafer, Keefer, Thomas and Wood, for appellee.
Thomas L. Wenger, Frank A. Sinon, and Rhoads, Sinon & Reader, for amici curiae.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth, Appellant, v. Bell Telephone Company of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 25, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Edward T. Baker, Deputy Attorney General, with him J. Shane Creamer, Attorney General, for Commonwealth, appellant.
Albert J. Tomalis, Jr., with him Leon D. Metzger, and Metzger, Hafer, Keefer, Thomas and Wood, for appellee.
Thomas L. Wenger, Frank A. Sinon, and Rhoads, Sinon & Reader, for amici curiae.
October 12, 1971:
